title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set.
OB: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set for a table report item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset for the table report item.
3. Try creating a new table group.
